mapper.sql: ID, Name, SN, Password,TeamName, BelongTeam, Gender, City, BirthDay, Age, Photo, CertNumber,EligibleDat, Occupation, PersonIntro, YearFeeStatus, MatchFeeStatus, ExamFeeStatus, AddUser, AddTime, prop1, prop2, prop3, prop4, YearFeePayDate, MatchFeePayDate, ExamFeePayDate
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CertNumber) from hx_people where CertNumber = #{certnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from hx_people where Name=#{arg0} and CertNumber=#{arg1}
select * from hx_people where (EligibleDat is null) OR (YearFeeStatus !=2)
select * from hx_people where EligibleDat is not null and YEAR(EligibleDat) >= YEAR(now())
mapper.insert: insert into hx_people (ID, Name, SN, Password,TeamName, BelongTeam, Gender, City, BirthDay, Age, Photo, CertNumber, Occupation, PersonIntro, YearFeeStatus, MatchFeeStatus, ExamFeeStatus, AddUser, AddTime, prop1, prop2, prop3, prop4, YearFeePayDate, MatchFeePayDate, ExamFeePayDate,EligibleDat ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{belongteam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yearfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matchfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prop3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prop4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yearfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{matchfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{examfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE},#{eligibledat,jdbcType=DATE} )

mapper.update:
update hx_people
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SN = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TeamName = #{teamname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BelongTeam = #{belongteam,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BirthDay = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
Age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CertNumber = #{certnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PersonIntro = #{personintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YearFeeStatus = #{yearfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MatchFeeStatus = #{matchfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ExamFeeStatus = #{examfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AddUser = #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE},
prop1 = #{prop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prop2 = #{prop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prop3 = #{prop3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prop4 = #{prop4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YearFeePayDate = #{yearfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE},
MatchFeePayDate = #{matchfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE},
ExamFeePayDate = #{examfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE},
EligibleDat = #{eligibledat,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hx_people set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TeamName = #{teamname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BelongTeam = #{belongteam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BirthDay = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, Age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CertNumber = #{certnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PersonIntro = #{personintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YearFeeStatus = #{yearfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MatchFeeStatus = #{matchfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ExamFeeStatus = #{examfeestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AddUser = #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE}, prop1 = #{prop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prop2 = #{prop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prop3 = #{prop3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prop4 = #{prop4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YearFeePayDate = #{yearfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE}, MatchFeePayDate = #{matchfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE}, ExamFeePayDate = #{examfeepaydate,jdbcType=DATE}, EligibleDat =#{eligibledat,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
